testcase.name: should should select the nested inline styles for the given key
should not return a style when no style has been set in the props
should hoist style definitions for the active modifiers
should not hoist modifier styles inside of element sub styles
should support passing multiple keys in an array
should support passing multiple keys as an object
should return the top-level inline style definitions if selectedKeys is not specified
should include nested inline style definitions for pseudo-class selectors
should include nested inline style definitions for media queries
should include keyframe objects assigned to `animationName` property
should merge nested inline styles in the order of appearance in the object
should merge element styles nested under modifiers if selectedKeys contain both, element keys and modifier keys
should merge modifier styles for nested elements after the base styles for those elements
should also pick the inline style sub object under the camelized version of the key
should correctly merge nested style definitions when selecting multiple modifiers
should hoist from multiple levels deep of nested modifier keys in inline styles
should merge more deeply nested style definitions with higher precedence
should make sure that more specific, i.e., deeper nested modifier styles, override styles higher up the object
should take default styles as second arg to merge the style prop with
should take a props decorator function as second arg of the constructor call and apply it on spread props
